payload.name: Resonant
payload.description: Resonants tap into the vibrational frequencies that underlie all matter, manipulating sound and force to devastating effect.

items.name: Explorer's Pack
items.notes: Backpack, bedroll, mess kit, tinderbox, torches (10), rations (10 days), waterskin, hempen rope (50 ft)

items.name: Entertainer's Pack
items.notes: Backpack, bedroll, 2 costumes, 5 candles, 5 days of rations, waterskin, disguise kit

gear.name: Explorer's Pack
gear.notes: Backpack, bedroll, mess kit, tinderbox, torches (10), rations (10 days), waterskin, hempen rope (50 ft)

payload.name: Harmonic Weaver
payload.description: Harmonic Weavers blend multiple frequencies together, creating complex patterns of sound and force that can heal allies or confound enemies.

payload.name: Shardguard
payload.description: Shardguards learn to conjure crystalline weapons and armor from pure will, adapting their equipment to any situation.

payload.name: Crystalborn
payload.summary: Beings of living crystal with innate magical resonance
payload.description: Crystalborn are humanoids whose bodies are composed of living crystalline material. They originate from the Elemental Plane of Earth, where raw magical energies merged with mineral formations to create sentient beings. Crystalborn have an innate connection to magical vibrations and can channel energy through their crystalline forms.
traits: Crystalline Body: Your body is made of living crystal. You have resistance to poison damage and advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

Living Gem: You don't need to eat, drink, or breathe. You also don't need to sleep and can't be put to sleep by magic. To gain the benefits of a long rest, you must spend at least 6 hours in an inactive, motionless state.
Resonant Form: You know the Mending cantrip. When you cast it on yourself, you can also restore 1 hit point. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell.
Natural Armor: When you aren't wearing armor, your AC equals 12 + your Dexterity modifier.

payload.title: Prismatic Pulse
payload.description: You project a beam of multicolored light at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 radiant damage and must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of your next turn. At Higher Levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

payload.title: Crystalline Shield
payload.casting: 1 reaction, which you take when you are hit by an attack
payload.description: A shimmering barrier of crystal energy springs into existence, granting you +5 to AC against the triggering attack and any subsequent attacks until the start of your next turn.

payload.title: Resonance Strike
payload.description: You release a concentrated wave of vibrational energy in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 4d10 thunder damage and is deafened for 1 minute. On a success, a creature takes half damage and isn't deafened. At Higher Levels: The damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 3rd.

payload.title: Shatter Point
payload.description: You touch an object or creature and identify structural weaknesses. If targeting a creature, for the duration, your attacks against it score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20, and the creature has vulnerability to one damage type of your choice. If targeting an object, it has vulnerability to all damage for the duration.

payload.name: Lattice Mind
payload.summary: Your thoughts are organized in crystalline patterns, granting mental resilience.
payload.description: You gain +1 to Intelligence or Wisdom, advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened, and you can perfectly recall anything you have seen or heard within the past month.

payload.name: Geomantic Apprentice
payload.description: You studied under a master who taught you to read the magical energies flowing through stone and crystal. You learned to identify mineral compositions and sense ley lines.

feature.name: Earth Reader
feature.description: You can spend 10 minutes examining natural stone or crystal formations to determine if any magical effects are present, the general direction of any nearby ley lines or magical nodes, and whether the area has been affected by earthquakes or magical upheaval in the past year.

payload.name: Quartz Heart
payload.description: Quartz Hearts channel pure, clear energy. Their crystalline forms are nearly transparent, and they excel at amplifying magical effects. They gain resistance to radiant damage and can cast the Light cantrip at will.

payload.name: Obsidian Shard
payload.description: Obsidian Shards are formed from volcanic glass, dark and sharp-edged. They are natural warriors, gaining resistance to fire damage and proficiency with one martial weapon of their choice.

payload.name: Refracted Defense
payload.description: When you are hit by a ranged attack, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by 1d6 + your proficiency bonus as your crystalline form refracts the incoming projectile.

payload.name: Pact of the Shard
payload.description: Your patron gifts you a crystalline focus that hovers near your shoulder. As a bonus action, you can command the shard to fire a beam at a creature within 30 feet, dealing 1d8 force damage on a hit. The shard uses your spell attack modifier.

payload.name: Crystalline Gaze
payload.description: You can see through solid crystal and glass as if it were transparent, up to 30 feet. Additionally, you have advantage on saving throws against being blinded.

payload.name: Fractured Spell
payload.description: When you cast a spell that deals damage to a single target, you can spend 2 sorcery points to split the damage between the original target and one other creature within 15 feet of it. Both targets take half the original damage.
